alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Otero and northeastern Sierra Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Three Rivers, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas Peak. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 86 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Sierra County Lakes
